description: Parses the data as an array of the given Schema Model
label: Parse Data To Array

options.info: The format of the data, can be CSV or JSON
options.label: Data Type
options.name: dataType

options.info: The actual data, can be text or a file
options.name: data
options.label: Data

options.info: The output format of the parsed data. This is used so that in later steps you can select the properties of this data
options.name: schemaModel
options.label: Schema Model

options.info: Choose a name for the variable under which the unique value which is grouped on will be available.
options.name: as
options.label: As
